DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study analyze knowledge attitude HPV vaccine among Brazilian woman educative intervention . The knowledge measure sexual behavior HPV infection . The attitude measure acceptance vaccine .
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred Brazilian woman select range 18 30 year old . They randomize two group : 1 ) One hundred receive brief educative intervention HPV infection vaccine answer questionaire sexual behavior , HPV infection vaccine 2 ) one hundred receive anything answered questionaire .
DOC.criteria: healthy woman previous CIN cervical cancer treatment
